Module org.example.miniproyecto_3
Package org.example.miniproyecto_3.View.Assets

Class ShipDrawer

java.lang.Object
org.example.miniproyecto_3.View.Assets.ShipDrawer
public class ShipDrawer extends Object
Utility class responsible for drawing ship assets as 2D shapes using the javafx.scene.shape methods.

The generated shapes are added to JavaFX containers like Pane or GridPane, and visually represent ships for the Battleship game.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShipDrawer

      public ShipDrawer()
      Constructs a new ShipDrawer instance.

      This constructor does not perform any operations by itself. It is used to access the drawing methods provided by this class.

  • Method Details

    • drawSmallShip

      public Pane drawSmallShip()
      Draws a small ship as 2D shapes groups them in a Group. Returns a snapShot of the group in a Pane.

      This method generates and returns a visual representation of a small ship, composed of various Shape nodes such as Rectangle, Ellipse, and Polygon.

      Returns:
      a snapshot in a Pane containing the small ship graphics.

    • drawMediumShip

      public Pane drawMediumShip()
      Draws a medium-sized ship as a Pane containing JavaFX 2D shapes.

      This method constructs a medium ship using a combination of JavaFX shapes such as Rectangle, Ellipse, and Polygon, arranged inside a Pane.

      Returns:
      a snaphot in a Pane that visually represents the medium ship.

    • drawSubmarine

      public Pane drawSubmarine()
      Draws a submarine as a Pane composed of JavaFX 2D shapes.

      This method builds a visual representation of a submarine using various JavaFX shape elements such as Rectangle, Ellipse, and Polygon. The returned Pane can be integrated into the UI to represent a submarine in the game.

      Returns:
      a snapShot in a Pane that contains the drawn submarine.

    • drawCarrier

      public Pane drawCarrier()
      Draws a carrier ship as a Pane made up of JavaFX 2D shapes.

      This method constructs the visual representation of a carrier using JavaFX shape nodes such as Rectangle, Ellipse, and Polygon. The resulting Pane can be used in the UI to display the carrier ship.

      Returns:
      a snapShot in a Pane containing the carrier ship graphics.

    • createMiniPlane

      private Group createMiniPlane(double layoutX, double layoutY, double rotate, String color, double scaleX, double scaleY)
      Creates a mini plane shape as a Group composed of multiple JavaFX shapes.

      The mini plane consists of two Polygon objects and one Rectangle, styled and positioned according to the parameters. This group is used as part of larger composite drawings, such as the carrier ship.

      Parameters:
      layoutX - the X coordinate where the mini plane group will be positioned.
      layoutY - the Y coordinate where the mini plane group will be positioned.
      rotate - the rotation angle (in degrees) applied to the group.
      color - the fill color for the shapes, expressed as a CSS-compatible color string.
      scaleX - the scale factor on the X axis.
      scaleY - the scale factor on the Y axis.
      Returns:
      a Group containing the mini plane shapes.

    • createTurret

      private Group createTurret(double layoutX, double layoutY, double rotate)
      Creates a turret shape as a Group consisting of several styled rectangles.

      The turret is composed of three Rectangle shapes, each styled with blue fill, black stroke, and rounded corners. The entire group can be positioned and rotated.

      Parameters:
      layoutX - the X coordinate where the turret group will be positioned.
      layoutY - the Y coordinate where the turret group will be positioned.
      rotate - the rotation angle (in degrees) applied to the group.
      Returns:
      a Group containing the turret shapes.

    • snapShot

      private VBox snapShot(Group group)
      Takes a snapshot of a Group and returns it wrapped inside a VBox containing an ImageView.

      The snapshot image is scaled down by 40% to reduce size and preserve the visual representation. The returned VBox is centered and sized to fit the snapshot.

      Parameters:
      group - the Group to snapshot.
      Returns:
      a VBox containing the snapshot image of the group.
      See Also:
      • SnapshotParameters
      • WritableImage
      • ImageView
